DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is collecting clinical data on the learning curve of different surgeons using the EinsteinVision® 3D visualization system in laparoscopic radical prostatectomies.
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing planned radical prostatectomy prostatectomy because of histologically proven prostate cancer using EinsteinVision® Written informed consent Age ≥ 18 years Previous TURP (= transurethral resection of the prostate) Previous operations on the sigmoid colon or rectum (e.g. because of carcinoma, perforation, diverticulum) BMI > 35 kg/m² Participation in another clinical study Representation by a legal guardian or under involuntary commitment
